components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Voice Call Failures and Dialing Delays to Verizon in the United States

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing voice call failures and dialing delays when placing calls to Verizon in the United States. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, North America

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays To and From a Subset of Twilio Numbers in Australia

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe latency in MMS delivery when sending messages to and from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia specially during the Australia peak traffic between 14:00 until 20:00 PST. We have also identified MMS delivery failures to and from the impacted subset of Twilio Numbers in Australia. We have identified that the primary cause of this latency is an on-going undersea cable fault. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Mexico, Afghanistan, Malaysia, Bulgaria, Germany, Senegal, Spain, Israel and the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 January 2026 at 16:00 PST until 14 January 2026 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Mexico, Afghanistan, Malaysia, Bulgaria, Germany, Senegal, Spain, Israel and Czech Republic handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 January 2026 at 21:00 PST until 14 January 2026 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Flex insights for database migration - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in US1 between 8:30 PM and 10:30 PM Pacific Time on 01/22/2026. During the maintenance window, customers may experience the below issue:
-Flex Realtime stats APIs may return 5xx errors for up to 5 minutes.
-Flex Realtime stats APIs might return bloated data `completed` metrics due to database maintenance.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 12 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 28 January 2026 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

12 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 12 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
14 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 14 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
19 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 19 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
21 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 21 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
26 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 26 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
28 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 28 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
